title: OpenWebUI Client Feedback - 2025-02-21
body_html:
OpenWebUI Client Feedback - 2025-02-21

Context: Testing a new Python-based client for OpenWebUI (using Python ask instead of raw HTTPS API).

Feedback:

  • Positive: More reliable connection; DeepSeek support now functional.
  • Negative: Streaming responses are not currently working (regression from previous implementation).

Note: This is part of a running log for development efforts related to Letta integration with OpenWebUI.
